Generation II.Gold: This upgraded version of Porygon is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, though.
Generation II.Silver: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
Generation II.Crystal: This manmade Pok é mon evolved from the latest technology. It may have unprogrammed reactions.
Generation II.Stadium 2: This upgraded version of Porygon is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, though. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made Pok é mon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
Generation III.Sapphire: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made Pok é mon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
Generation III.Emerald: It was created by humans using the power of science. It has been given artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
Generation III.FireRed: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
Generation III.LeafGreen: This upgraded version of Porygon is designed for space exploration. However, it can't even fly.

Generation IV.Diamond: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
Generation IV.Pearl: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
Generation IV.Platinum: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
Generation IV.HeartGold: This upgraded version of Porygon is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, however.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.

Generation V.Black: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
Generation V.White: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
Generation V.Black 2: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
Generation V.White 2: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.

Generation VI.X: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
Generation VI.Y: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made Pokémon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made Pokémon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.

Generation VII.Sun: For the purposes of planetary development, Porygon was updated with the most cutting-edge technology available.
Generation VII.Moon: Porygon was updated to a new version in readiness for planetary development. But that dream remains unrealized as yet.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: AI has been installed in it. It learns various things all on its own, but it even remembers things it doesn't need to know.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Even though it doesn't die in the vacuum of space, it can't move around very well in zero gravity.

Generation VIII.Sword: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.
Generation VIII.Shield: After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokémon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A bizarre item caused this Pokémon to evolve. While it now exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology remains inscrutable.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This artificial Pokémon evolved thanks to cutting- edge science. It sometimes displays behavior that is not in its programming.
Generation IX.Violet: Porygon was upgraded to become capable of planetary development. However, this upgraded version cannot even fly yet.
